author: julianfoad
msg: Pass the temporary text base path through more of the WC layers.  This is a
step towards the desired WC-NG data flow in which we will replace this path
with a SHA-1 checksum that refers to a pristine text in the pristine text
(process_committed_leaf): Derive the temporary text base path here and pass
(svn_wc__wq_add_postcommit): Take the temp text base path as an extra
(install_committed_file): Take the temp text base path and use it instead
pass on the temp text base path.
